name: attr

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Commands for Manipulating Filesystem Extended Attributes

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependent_to.name: bfs
dependent_to.description: A breadth-first version of the UNIX find command.

dependent_to.name: libcap-ng
dependent_to.description: Libcap-ng is a library that makes using posix capabilities easier

dependent_to.name: acl
dependent_to.description: Commands for Manipulating POSIX Access Control Lists.

dependent_to.name: mpifileutils
dependent_to.description:
mpiFileUtils is a suite of MPI-based tools to manage large datasets,
which may vary from large directory trees to large files. High-
performance computing users often generate large datasets with parallel
applications that run with many processes (millions in some cases).
However those users are then stuck with single-process tools like cp and
rm to manage their datasets. This suite provides MPI-based tools to
handle typical jobs like copy, remove, and compare for such datasets,
providing speedups of up to 20-30x.
